rComments: Melissa is the kind of professor you'll remember forever for being genuinely kind, loving and interested. There is absolutely nothing bad to say about her. If you are at all interested in the subject material and are willing to engage, she'll be there for you. I could rave about her all day....

Each person only got to workshop once, but then the workshops were whole-class discussions. Come prepared to each class and you should do very well. Overall, Melissa was an excellent teacher and I would be glad to take another class with her.

Melissa is the best. She's one of the most approachable profs I've met at UCSC. Since it's a creative writing workshop class, her comments are sometimes more important than lectures. She's both critical and encouraging. Her classes aren't difficult to pass as long as you try hard, attend class and keep up with the reading.

Melissa is the type of professor that every student deserves to have at least once. She's understanding and approachable but also professional and wise. She leads great discussions about peer work and work from the reader and facilitates some of the best discussions about technique that I've ever had. I just wish she taught more classes!
